DATADOG MONITORING CONFIGURATION

Datadog Monitoring Configuration for VibeCode

Section titled “Datadog Monitoring Configuration for VibeCode”

This document outlines the comprehensive Datadog monitoring setup across all environments (dev/stg/prd).

🎯 Monitoring Strategy

Section titled “🎯 Monitoring Strategy”

Environment Parity

Section titled “Environment Parity”
  • Development (KIND): Full monitoring stack with dummy credentials
  • Staging (Azure AKS): Production-like monitoring with staging tags
  • Production (Azure AKS): Full production monitoring with real credentials

Key Monitoring Features

Section titled “Key Monitoring Features”
  • ✅ Application Performance Monitoring (APM)
  • ✅ Infrastructure Monitoring
  • ✅ Log Aggregation
  • ✅ Database Monitoring
  • ✅ Container Insights
  • ✅ Network Monitoring
  • ✅ Security Monitoring

🏗️ Architecture Overview

Section titled “🏗️ Architecture Overview”

📊 Deployment Configurations

Section titled “📊 Deployment Configurations”

1. KIND (Local Development)

Section titled “1. KIND (Local Development)”

Location: scripts/deploy-kind-with-monitoring.sh

Configuration:

  • Lightweight DaemonSet deployment
  • Dummy API keys for local development
  • Basic monitoring features enabled
  • Resource limits: 256Mi memory, 100m CPU

Tags:

Features Enabled:

  • ✅ Container monitoring
  • ✅ Process monitoring
  • ✅ Log collection
  • ✅ APM tracing
  • ❌ Network monitoring (disabled for performance)
  • ❌ Database monitoring (no production DB in KIND)

2. Azure Staging/Production

Section titled “2. Azure Staging/Production”

Location: infrastructure/terraform/azure/kubernetes-deployment.tf

Configuration:

  • Helm chart deployment (datadog/datadog)
  • Production Datadog credentials from Key Vault
  • Full monitoring stack enabled
  • High availability configuration

Features Enabled:

  • ✅ Container insights
  • ✅ Database monitoring (PostgreSQL)
  • ✅ APM tracing
  • ✅ Log aggregation
  • ✅ Network monitoring
  • ✅ Security scanning
  • ✅ Orchestrator explorer

🔧 Configuration Files

Section titled “🔧 Configuration Files”

KIND Configuration

Section titled “KIND Configuration”

Terraform Configuration

Section titled “Terraform Configuration”

🚀 Deployment Process

Section titled “🚀 Deployment Process”

Automated Deployment

Section titled “Automated Deployment”

  1. KIND (Local):

  2. Azure (Terraform):

  3. CI/CD (GitHub Actions):

    • Automatically deploys monitoring in staging
    • Validates monitoring deployment
    • Tests Datadog agent connectivity

Manual Verification

Section titled “Manual Verification”

📈 Monitoring Dashboards

Section titled “📈 Monitoring Dashboards”

Key Metrics Tracked

Section titled “Key Metrics Tracked”

Application Metrics:

  • Request latency (p50, p95, p99)
  • Error rates
  • Throughput (requests/second)
  • Apdex scores

Infrastructure Metrics:

  • CPU utilization
  • Memory usage
  • Disk I/O
  • Network traffic

Database Metrics:

  • Query performance
  • Connection pool status
  • Slow queries
  • Lock contention

Container Metrics:

  • Pod restart counts
  • Resource utilization
  • Image pull times
  • Health check status

Custom Dashboards

Section titled “Custom Dashboards”

  1. VibeCode Application Overview

    • Service map
    • Error tracking
    • Performance metrics

  2. Infrastructure Health

    • Kubernetes cluster status
    • Node performance
    • Resource allocation

  3. Database Performance

    • PostgreSQL metrics
    • Query performance
    • Connection monitoring

🔔 Alerting Configuration

Section titled “🔔 Alerting Configuration”

Critical Alerts

Section titled “Critical Alerts”
  1. Application Down: Service unavailable > 1 minute
  2. High Error Rate: Error rate > 5% for 5 minutes
  3. High Latency: p95 latency > 2s for 5 minutes
  4. Resource Exhaustion: CPU > 90% or Memory > 95%

Warning Alerts

Section titled “Warning Alerts”
  1. Moderate Latency: p95 latency > 1s for 10 minutes
  2. Increased Errors: Error rate > 2% for 10 minutes
  3. Resource Pressure: CPU > 70% or Memory > 80%

🔐 Security and Access

Section titled “🔐 Security and Access”

API Key Management

Section titled “API Key Management”

KIND (Local):

  • Uses dummy credentials
  • No sensitive data exposure
  • Local development only

Azure (Production):

  • API keys stored in Azure Key Vault
  • Workload identity authentication
  • Encrypted in transit and at rest

RBAC Configuration

Section titled “RBAC Configuration”

🧪 Testing and Validation

Section titled “🧪 Testing and Validation”

Automated Tests

Section titled “Automated Tests”
  1. Deployment Test: Validates Datadog agent deployment
  2. Connectivity Test: Checks metric collection
  3. Integration Test: Verifies dashboard data

Manual Validation Checklist

Section titled “Manual Validation Checklist”
  • Datadog agent pods running
  • Metrics appearing in Datadog dashboard
  • Logs being collected
  • APM traces visible
  • Alerts configured and firing
  • Custom dashboards populated

Section titled “📚 Documentation Links”
  • Datadog Kubernetes Integration
  • Azure AKS Monitoring
  • Helm Chart Configuration

🛠️ Troubleshooting

Section titled “🛠️ Troubleshooting”

Common Issues

Section titled “Common Issues”

  1. Agent Not Starting:

  2. No Metrics in Dashboard:

    • Check API key configuration
    • Verify network connectivity
    • Review agent logs

  3. High Resource Usage:

    • Adjust resource limits
    • Disable unnecessary features
    • Optimize collection intervals

Debug Commands

Section titled “Debug Commands”

📅 Maintenance

Section titled “📅 Maintenance”

Regular Tasks

Section titled “Regular Tasks”
  1. Weekly: Review dashboard metrics and alerts
  2. Monthly: Update agent versions
  3. Quarterly: Review and optimize monitoring configuration
